ygData.subject: fp quests
ygData.msgSnippet: well, i m really not sure any more what makes groflah appear. in both cases i made him show up it was just after i had talked to netuk.. and i THINK it was
ygData.messageBody:
well, i'm really not sure any more what makes groflah appear. in both
cases i made him show up it was just after i had talked to netuk.. and i
THINK it was late at night. but it is entirely possible that it was just
random.. i dont think a paladin triggered the quest, because the paladin
i'd talked to said groflah appeared UPSTAIRS for him, and the groflah i
met appeared downstairs. dont worry if you have trouble with this one..
as i said before, the quest really isnt worth it ;p

lady shae's quest is broken because she never drops the note. she does
leave a corpse, it just doesnt have anything in it.

also, since the quest for the electrum bladed wakizashi has changed,
does anybody know what grimrot gives now when you return arlena's
remains?

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
